messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] If you missed the newsletter --
messages.msgSnippet: Of course I just ordered yesterday at the regular price :(.  ~Rue ... From: LisaBugg [mailto:LisaBugg@unschooling.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 8:13 AM
messages.messageBody:
Of course I just ordered yesterday at the regular price :(. ~Rue

-----Original Message-----
From: LisaBugg [mailto:LisaBugg@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2001 8:13 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] If you missed the newsletter --


For those that missed the newsletter here's the information on HEM. ;)

********************
Just For Us!

Home Education Magazine is offering Unschooling.com Online Newsletter
Readers a special subscription price. Check it out at
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com/sale/_unschooling.html

Home Education magazine has been the only homeschooling magazine I have ever
subscribed to. It's packed full of outstanding and thought-provoking
articles, support group listings, a great pen pal section, and always
up-to-date information on issues affecting the homeschooling community. ---

For a sample issue sent an email to Info@home-ed-magazine,com or visit
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com/ORD/frm_info.html.


Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com

To unsubscribe, set preferences, or read archives:
http://www.egroups.com/group/Unschooling-dotcom

Another great list sponsored by Home Education Magazine!
http://www.home-ed-magazine.com



Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
